name: PyTris
description:
Just Tetris and currently a V1.0

This is my tetris Game engine created in python that I have been working really hard on, and have been trying to make ever since I started programming. This has been a huge milestone for me and has helped me find courage in the depths of game development despair.

Also leave a comment if you get  any bugs because I am my own QA team at this point lol

Controls

  • A/D - Move piece left or right
  • Left/Right Key - Rotate in that direction.
  • Space - Jump to bottom. (as of now this might be a bit buggy, and needs some fixing to get right)

No scoring yet as this is V1.0, but these are the features I'm planning to add and are also visible in the source code at https://github.com/TobleroneBill/TETRIS:

    Coming Updates:
  • V 1.1 - up next queue, score and level increase
  • V 1.2 - Main Menu, Sounds and perhaps some graphics ;)
  • V 1.3 - Multiple Game Modes - single block mode, maybe a puzzle mode, marathon etc. (will think about this when i get to it)
